Event.name: Suspicion
Event.definition:
<def-root>A person or group, the <fen>Authority</fen>, believes that another person, the <fen>Suspect</fen> is a participant in a criminal <fen>Incident</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Authority">The police</fex> <t>suspect</t> <fex name="Suspect">Noah Rogers</fex> <fex name="Incident">of aiding the robbery last night at Shop-n-drive</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Authority
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Authority</fen> is the group or person who suspects the <fen>Suspect</fen> of criminal activity.</def-root>

Arg.name: Suspect
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Suspect</fen> is the target of the <fen>Authority</fen>'s suspicion.</def-root>

Arg.name: Incident
Arg.definition: <def-root>The (typically criminal) <fen>Incident</fen> in which the <fen>Suspect</fen> is suspected of being involved.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>When the suspecting takes place. <ex>Jakobson was placed <t>under</t> <t>suspicion</t> <fex name="Time">last week</fex> .</ex> <ex><fex name="Time">At that time</fex>, the police <t>suspected</t> no one.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: suspect.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: believe (someone) to be guilty of a crime or offence, without certain proof.

lexUnit.name: under suspicion (of).prep
lexUnit.definition: FN: (of a person) be suspected of involvement in a crime.

lexUnit.name: suspect.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a person suspected of a crime or offence.
